knowledge: Marathon (media) . Marathons have proven to be a viable way of rerunning reality television contests, which have otherwise been relatively difficult to rerun in traditional forms (e.g. daily "strip" syndication) because of the loss of the element of surprise. In December 2012, MTV announced that it would air a seven-day (168-hour) marathon of "Jersey Shore" before the series finale on December 20, 2012; this marked one of the longest marathons in television history.
